recommendations: Joe Chui ‚ÄúI had the great pleasure working with Wesley since 2006 during the time when we both were in Morrison Express Wesley was my key contact window and good partner for business development for S.China/Netherland traffics Wesley was a very detailed person with abundant of product knowledge especially for Greater China-EU traffics and amazing hunting skills for new business. We had a unforgettably wonderful time in the past when worked together promoting the trade lane with scores of different wins over even some big players in the markets Wesley did shown great capability in managing the whole sales process starting from door opening upto deal closing, as well as good skills internally to work with support teams to ensure good implementation and service delivery to customers All in all Wesley is an excellent staff in freight forwarding industry, an efficient and effective 'business generator', not matter directly personal participation or driving team to achieve sales targets‚Äù

Yuri Comans ‚ÄúWesley is related to me as former National Salesmanager for Morrison Express Netherlands. He is an intelligent, driven person with the required background/experience, but also the competence in soft skills to score global accounts for an international freight forwarder. His personality can be described as enthousiastic and holds great sense of humor. I wish him lots of achievements in his undoubted succesful career!‚Äù
